title: Please help, Can't ID this Sans Serif
author: nolete

comments.content: Apparently nobody has identified it so could be bespoke. Would you please share some details about your sample like origin, website, brand...? That might be helpful.

Thanks for the suggestion Ryuk... I finally found it. It is Akceler by Adtypo.  
Amazing font.

[https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adtypo/akceler/aalt-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123703/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adtypo/akceler/aalt-bold/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adtypo/akceler/aalt-bold/")
Good you find it and sorry for having been so helpless.
